comment_data.body: Hi, sorry I know this isn´t the best place to put it here, but im trying to implement Whatsapp in j2me and I having the same exact issue. Im almost sure that my response is being formed good. Now Im not sure if my code is bad or whatsapp changed something...

title: not-authorized error after correct authentication
